transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Hello! Welcome to Battery Smart. I'm Priya, your customer support agent. How can I assist you today? Is there something specific you'd like to know or an issue you're facing with our services?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I understand you'd like to speak with a human agent, specifically a manager. Let me connect you right away. Please hold for a moment. ||TRANSFER||

formatted_transcript:
Agent: Thank you for calling Battery Smart! My name is Priya. How may I help you today?

Customer: I want to call

Agent: Hello! Welcome to Battery Smart. I'm Priya, your customer support agent. How can I assist you today? Is there something specific you'd like to know or an issue you're facing with our services?

Customer: manager

Agent: I understand you'd like to speak with a human agent, specifically a manager. Let me connect you right away. Please hold for a moment. ||TRANSFER||
